description:
Gets the integration event placeholders of an entity.

Supported entities are:
- Incident
- Change Request
- Service Request
- Problem
- Task

results.name: Alert ID(s)
results.description: Alert id(s) of the incident incase incident is created from alert

results.name: Alert source
results.description: Source of the alert in case the incident is created from alert

results.name: Assigned device id(s)
results.description: Assigned device id(s) of the incident

results.name: Assigned device(s) location
results.description: Assigned device(s) location of the incident

results.name: Assignee group name
results.description: Assignee Group name of the Incident

results.name: Associated change request ID
results.description: Associated changeRequest ID of the incident

results.name: Associated incident ID
results.description: Associated parent incident ID of the incident

results.name: Associated problem ID
results.description: Associated problem ID of the incident

results.name: Attachment base64 binary
results.description: Attached file content in base64 binary data

results.name: Latest comments added by
results.description: User who added latest response to incident

results.name: Priority updated by
results.description: User who updated priority of the incident

results.name: Reason to change status
results.description: Corresponding reason to change incident status

results.name: Reported user name
results.description: User who has created the incident

results.name: Source entity
results.description: From which source the incident was created (e.g, Alert or API, etc..)

results.name: Source entity ID
results.description: ID of the source from which incident was created(e.g, Alert ID)

results.name: Source policy
results.description: From which policy the incident was created (e.g, Autoincident, etc..) if any

results.name: Source policy ID
results.description: ID of the policy from which incident was created(e.g, Autoincident policy ID)

results.name: Status updated by
results.description: User who updated the status of the incident

results.name: Suspend end date
results.description: Suspend end date of the Incident

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Describes the client ID or msp ID of the tenant
